title: 820-3476 doesn't sense battery or...
message:
I have 820-3476 mildly water damaged, battery have water stains.

The macbook turns on with magsafe plugged in. Original damaged battery says "battery need replacement". So I order replacement and just received. I dont think it is original battery.

Macbook doesnt charge or sense new battery at all. 

I already ask question on how to test the battery (answer was cant).

Can I test motherboard some how? 
SYS_DETECT_L on battery connector keep going from 0.010v to 0.500v with new battery.  SMBUS_BATT has 3v , and PPVBAT_G3H_CONN jumps to 3.5v and then goes down


What can I check to make sure I just have a bad battery or something else?

title: 820-3476 doesn't sense battery or...
message: If it still sees the old battery as needing replacement the "new" battery is probably just garbage. Also check if PPBUS is still at 12.56V and not 12.3V
